forensic.name: Anonymous from GitHub
forensic.desc: Hello! Please help me find this anonymous person’s work email. To turn in a flag, wrap your mail in "CODEBY{}"

forensic.name: Dead image
forensic.desc: During the conversion of an image from PNG to BMP, the entire file structure was lost. Can you help me restore it?

forensic.name: Encrypted traffic
forensic.desc: There was a leak in our company. Find out how the attacker leaked the information.

forensic.name: Joke at a presentation
forensic.desc: I received a presentation in the mail from a stranger. I downloaded it, but forgot to open it. Only then did I realize that it seemed like I had caught the virus

forensic.name: Magical friend
forensic.desc: Someone made a big mess with the file. If you fix this, you will receive a valuable prize

forensic.name: Owl memes
forensic.desc: My friend likes to store owl memes on a separate flash drive. I wonder why?

forensic.name: Processing should be kept secret
forensic.desc: When analyzing the attacker's hard drive, a password-protected secret_text.zip archive was found. In other files, the word codeby, various numbers and 8-character passwords are often found. Colleagues have already run the archive through 2 billion passwords, but to no avail. I heard that you have a video card farm. Can you help?

forensic.name: Safe random
forensic.desc: Decipher it if you can of course =D

forensic.name: Some kind of DMP
forensic.desc: A friend here sent me a file and asked me to look at it. And I don’t know what to do with it :)

forensic.name: Strange ZIP archive
forensic.desc: The deadline is tomorrow, and the freelancer cheated us out of money... He sent us a strange archive and stopped communicating. Please do something about this misunderstanding!

forensic.name: ZipLock
forensic.desc: I forgot the password for the archive with important information, please help me recover it 👉👈

pwn.name: BOF Administrator programmerq
pwn.desc: I found some kind of admin panel here. I want to get on this server, I want it! Help me please. I think there is some interesting file on the server...

pwn.name: BOF Far Side of the Moon
pwn.desc: They say there is something on the far side of the moon. And I think I guess what. But I need your help again to check :)

pwn.name: BOF Hey Squidward
pwn.desc: Wow, it's Squidward! But it looks kind of strange... But I’ll still check with him if he knows where the flag is.

pwn.name: BOF Volume control
pwn.desc: Wow, this is a new UI and UX development. Yes, there is also a PREMIUM version! You need to see this miracle!

pwn.name: EXEcutor
pwn.desc: Well, I finally downloaded Windows! And I even wrote a calculator in it, but it works strangely...

pwn.name: Examqq
pwn.desc: Exams again... And they need to be solved. The year is 2077 and exams are already electronic and unusual. Fortunately, I have 1 task from it.

pwn.name: Secretly around the world
pwn.desc: We got our hands on a file from the Secure Notes Company servers. Many people haven't liked their license for a long time, so it's worth looking into what kind of "NOP" encryption is used there.

pwn.name: Simple BOF Harmful Penguin
pwn.desc: Do you know how to convince this mischievous penguin? If yes, help me please.

pwn.name: Simple BOF I want to buy this flag
pwn.desc: I have $1000 in my bank account. And the flag costs many times more. What should I do??

pwn.name: They
pwn.desc: Vova disappeared a few days ago. No messages, calls, he does not appear online. I'm perplexed - what's going on? Where is he? We always supported each other. I feel like something is wrong...

pwn.name: Tsar admin
pwn.desc:
Only a few people can be admin kings! Our developers of the console interface for CTF understand this, so they made a special authorization option for administrators...

We also use only the most popular ciphers and encodings!

rev.name: Classic
rev.desc: These tests again... And also questions about the classics. I don't know her at all...

rev.name: Donut
rev.desc:
I love the taste of donuts,
But I need security.
EXE is like a secret labyrinth,
And I know for sure that I can reverse it without sleep.

rev.name: Encryption or something like that
rev.desc: Now it is even more difficult to guess the flag, we have added an encryption function.

rev.name: Functional hell
rev.desc: Some “clever guy” created functions with some numbers, but what to do with it?

rev.name: Invalid
rev.desc: I restored the deleted binary, but it won't run...

rev.name: My first game
rev.desc: I always knew that I could create the best game in the whole wide world. And you won't pass it!

rev.name: On the way to Capybara Castle
rev.desc: On the way to the flag!

rev.name: One and a half ruble clasp
rev.desc: A good toy for a good reverse engineer!

rev.name: PYC files
rev.desc: I lost my flag checking code, but I found the PYC file =D

rev.name: P please run this f file
rev.desc: I p-ask you to p-run this file and enter the data.

rev.name: Pumpkin
rev.desc: This is an interesting story! Only this is the end...

rev.name: Rearrangements
rev.desc: Well, can you guess the flag?)

rev.name: Snake bite
rev.desc: You were bitten by a snake. It's time to read the bytecode!

rev.name: The task of the ancient Rus
rev.desc: The truth about the great battle was hidden in the archive all this time. And most importantly, the files from that time have been preserved! Only part of the information was lost...

rev.name: randomqq
rev.desc: A friend of mine from the forum made some strange file encryptor. I know a lot about his algorithm: nothing. No idea what it does, but it can definitely be reversed. Help me please do this. But for some reason it still won't start... The archive contains an encrypted file with a flag and the encryptor itself. I really want to understand what is in the encrypted file!

stegano.name: All seeing
stegano.desc:
Are you sure the task is not broken?

Flag format: CODEBY{}

stegano.name: Dark fantasy
stegano.desc: “Don’t be afraid of the dark, it’s the place where you can hide” - August Verona

stegano.name: Essay
Grocery list
stegano.desc: Mom sent me to the store to buy groceries, but there was clearly something extra. Are you sure she didn't mix anything up?

stegano.name: Management
stegano.desc:
We found evidence of the crime - printed sheets of this document. The goal is to find out the serial number of the printer on which it was printed.

Flag format: CODEBY{serial}

stegano.name: N N
stegano.desc: There's speculation that the person whose traffic we intercepted is somehow communicating via DOCX files. Our team didn't find anything suspicious, but you might see something.

stegano.name: Stereogram
stegano.desc: Strengthen your eyes to find out the truth =)

stegano.name: Stickers
stegano.desc: We recently released our own sticker pack. I slightly changed what the designer sent me. Please rate it and don't miss anything

stegano.name: Suspicious traffic
stegano.desc: Our company regularly leaks data. Our leak detection and prevention systems detected nothing. Apparently, someone is using a very cunning data transfer scheme

stegano.name: Wide monitor
stegano.desc: Sometimes we don't see the full picture...
